PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FireSuppressionTerminalTypeSprinkler
PropertySetDef.Definition: Device for sprinkling water from a pipe under pressure over an area (BS6100 100 3432)

PropertyDef.Name: SprinklerType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of sprinkler from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: Activation
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined methods of sprinkler activation from which that required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: Response
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined methods of sprinkler response from which that required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: ActivationTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: The temperature at which the object is designed to activate.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverageArea
PropertyDef.Definition:
The area that is covered by the object.
Indicates the area that the sprinkler is designed to protect.

PropertyDef.Name: HasDeflector
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the sprinkler has a deflector (baffle) fitted to diffuse the discharge on activation (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: BulbLiquidColour
PropertyDef.Definition: The colour of the liquid in the bulb for a bulb activated sprinkler. Note that the liquid colour varies according to the activation temperature requirement of the sprinkler head. Note also that this property does not need to be asserted for quick response activated sprinklers.

PropertyDef.Name: DischargeFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The volumetric rate of fluid discharge.

PropertyDef.Name: ResidualFlowingPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: The residual flowing pressure in the pipeline at which the discharge flow rate is determined.

PropertyDef.Name: DischargeCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: The coefficient of flow at the sprinkler.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumWorkingPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum pressure that the object is manufactured to withstand.

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition:
The connection size of the object.
Inlet connection to sprinkler.
